snippet: Melinda Gates, just back from a trip to Bangladesh, along with Nicholas Kristof, answer readers' questions about the developing world.
abstract: Melinda Gates, just back from a trip to Bangladesh, along with Nicholas Kristof, answer readers' questions about the developing world.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Gates, of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, recently returned from a three-day trip to Bangladesh. She, along with Nick, agreed to answer readers' questions about development issues focusing on that part of the world. Here is the second of three installments.

headline.main: Melinda Gates Answers Questions, Part II
